All Wildheart rages now give bonus damage to off-hand melee weapon attacks as intended. Wildheart rages should now also deal the improved damage past Level 9. Updated War Magic to make sure it works with Extra Attack if you trigger War Magic during an Extra Attack. Shadow Blade, granted by the Shadow Blade Ring, no longer requires Concentration.
